message.body: What are you doing Saturday Michael wants to do something nice for you.
The 25th. Okay I'm going to tell him you are free. You will like it.
I don't know. When do your classes start
Probably Friday or saturday.
When do u get back?
Shit. We need to go to Asheville on Friday
I mean I guess I can come home Thursday
I have a meeting next Tuesday
For work
Well I guess you aren't going to be able to go anyway then, so I will just go by myself later
We can't go Friday-Monday?
We could but that is a whole lot of driving to do in 4 days
And that would only give us Sunday to check out Asheville
Okay. Well I'd like to go. Maybe I can push my work meeting
Let me see if Xavier is available
Okay
I don't have any email/ cell service. I'm at the library
I'll just plan to come home on Thursday
Of I come home tomorrow, could you miss your Thursday class?
Yeah but I would rather miss my illustrator class. Let me first see if he can show the property on Saturday
Okay.
I'll let u know as soon as i do.
Okay. I'll call you from my Moms phone after dinner tonight.
So should I leave Thursday?
I still haven't heard anything
He said we can come this weekend. So you could come back tomorrow or Thursday. Your kitty is going to be so sad
I think we should leave early on Friday

So the main reason I wanted to go this weekend is because it is the only time before you start teaching. If I am going to go by myself, I should probably wait til my classes are done and go to SC from there. I don't think I can afford to go by myself this weekend and then again at the end of September
I can go. But I have to be back Tuesday. I just emailed Loren to let her know I won't be back til the 19th
Ok
Meeting her on Wednesday. I will have to finalize my syllabi in the car. They are due Monday
How long is the ride
10 hrs or so
Okay! Plenty of time to do work. Are we gonna camp
We won't have time to on Friday. We could try sat and sun depending on the weather
